206a4(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sor mo'i 'phreng ba ni gang zag ya rabs lags te bcom ldan 'das mthong ma thag tu bdag nyid srid pa thams cad las nges par rgal to// de
206a5(mdo sde): nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pa ma rnyed na 'jig rten na chos la bdag
206a6(mdo sde): po byed pa'i sems can su dag yod// smras pa rigs kyi bu chos mngon pa'i lung las bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu bstan te/ dge slong rnams na ba dang na ba wa bu gsum rtse
206a7(mdo sde): na pa gsum gang zhe na/ log par nges pa zhes bya ba dang yang dag pa nyid du nges pa zhes bya ba dang / ma nges pa'i gang zag ces bsten to// de la log par nges pa gang zhe na/
206b1(mdo sde): par nges pa zhes bya ba ni skyes bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'dul bar mi nus pa'o// yang dag pa nyid du nges pa zhes bya ba ni dper na btsun pa 'jam dpal 'od srungs chen po la bu de bzhin/
206b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa ma byung ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir de kho na'i chos la rab tu zhugs pa'o// smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes par btsun pa
206b3(mdo sde): gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po bdag nyid de kho na'i chos la rab tu zhugs so zhes ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa ste/ gang chos la gnas pa de dag gi
206b4(mdo sde): khyim na de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs su// dper na 'bab chu thams cad ni char las byung ste/ char med kyang gal te chu 'bab pa de la mkhas pas 'di ltar bsam mo// char med par
206b5(mdo sde): chu 'bab pa de ni gnas nas med kyis gzhan du char 'bab par rigs par bya ste/ de las 'bab chu 'bab par rig par bya'o// de bzhin du mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten
206b6(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i mchog gi chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas las 'bab ste/ de bas na btsun pa 'od srungs chen po yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du rab tu 'byung ba rig par bya'o//
206b7(mdo sde): ji ltar skye bo thams cad kyis sgyu ma mi mthong zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig gis mkhyen pa ma yin gyi/ gzhan du char 'bab pa bzhin te// de'i phyir sangs rgyas med
207a1(mdo sde): pa'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyang bdag nyid nges par mi sgrol gyi rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi mngon sum du nges par sgrol bar rig par bya'o// gzhan yang btsun pa skyes bu la la/
207a2(mdo sde): zhig zla ba dang nyi ma mthong nas khyim gyi nang du zhugs nas de gnyis kyis mi mthong ngo snyam du sems na ci zla ba dang nyi mas mthong ngam mthong mod kyi mi mi mkhas pa khyim gyi nang du zhug
207a3(mdo sde): ma thag tu zla ba dang nyi mas mi mthong ngo snyam du sems te/ de bzhin du btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu yang mi mkhas pa bzhin ma zer cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu sems can rnams nges
207a4(mdo sde): par sgrol te/ rtag tu sems can rnams rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dzin du 'jug go// de'i phyir gang zag log par nges pa dang / yang dag pa nyid du nges pa ste/ ma nges
207a5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba gsum pa med do// smras pa 'jig rten pa la yang tshul khrims lnga yod do// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i dus na yod do// smras pa btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu de skad ma
207a6(mdo sde): zer cig/ ci tsam chos dang 'thun pa'i tshul khrims dang cho ga dang yon tan 'jig rten na 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag yod pa de dag thams cad du thams cad sangs
207a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi tshig rab tu rig par bya'o// smras pa/ nad pa lta ba'i gtam rnam pa gsum ste/ nad pa kha cig sman pa rnyed na 'tsho ba yod do// nad pa kha cig sman pa ma rnyed kyang 'tshe ba yod do/
207b1(mdo sde): shAn snyan pa rgyang ma 'a ba pa/ nab gsum du med de/ na stan pa rlung kya 'dul nas mtsha san pa na ngam la /
207b2(mdo sde): sor mi rung ba dang / rnam pa gnyis s+ho// sngas pa gsum ma yin te/ nad pa la ga ni sman pa ma da kyang 'amatha ya nga / gnang pa la bag na ldan pa dang galas rna
207b3(mdo sde): bayod do// sal te snga na med na sman pas kyang ci zhig bya// nad pas gang ldan pa ma rnyed kyang 'tsho ba de sbar pa rnyid mang ltar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur te/ rtsa gcig gis sman pa bya ba shes pa ma yin
207b4(mdo sde): zas mi bzas pa'i chog gtang ba yang shes so// gal te thams cad mi shes na dus ma yin par 'chi bas shi bar 'gyur ro// de'i phyir nad pa gsor rung ba dang gsor mi rung ba ste slar
207b5(mdo sde): pa yang rnyed spyan dang g.yog rnyed kyang / gal te 'chin ni de don med pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te sman dang g.yog dang sman pa yang ma rnyed sman pa rnyed la sman ma rnyed
207b6(mdo sde): pa ste/ de'i phyir sman pa dang / sman rnyed kyang mi 'tshon sman dang sman pa'i bye brag kyang med do// ci'i phyir tshe'i rig byed las lus khri ba dang / yang ba'i byab thams cad 'byung
207b7(mdo sde): de'i phyir btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gsor rung yang rung la/ mi rung yang mi rung zhes bya bar rnam pa gsum du rtog pa rnam pa gsum du med do// de ni nyan thos kyi shes pa ste/ sdang bu lta bu/
208a1(mdo sde): shes pa'o zhes mkhas pa rnams mdzord to// mi mkhas pa rnams kyi phyir rnam pa gnyis su brtags te/ de la log par nges pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chen pa'o// yang das/
208a2(mdo sde): par nges pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu ngo mtshar rnam pa gnyis te rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'dod chen
208a3(mdo sde): pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mchog gi gnas su ngo mtshar du gyur pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa las mtho ba'i gnas gzhan mi gda' ste ngo mtshar to// dma' ba'i gnas su yang 'dod
208a4(mdo sde): mangs las gzhan mi snang ngo // dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed cig 'gro ba de bzhin du 'dod chen po yang pha rol tu phyin pa bcwa
208a5(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par byed cing 'gro'o// dper na de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag gis bu dang / mig dang / sha bye ba'i phung pori rab pas
208a6(mdo sde): bde bas lhag par gtong ba de bzhin du 'dod chen gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'dod chen pa'ang na ma yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du song ba de'i tshe der g.yem pa'i
208a7(mdo sde): sems skye ste/ de'i tshe myur du bud med mang po 'byung ste bu mang po yang 'byung ste/ sems tsam gyis bde ba la 'thob par ga la 'gyur/ de nas myur du bdag gi bu bza' ba'i sems skyes
208b1(mdo sde): 'o// sang las kyis thas to/ ga gas su te thong ba rnams la yang bya rnam pa byin te sbyin pa de dag kyang byaba'o// yang bdag N+DI kyang thams cad pa/
208b2(mdo sde): de ltar 'dod chen pa'ang 'dod cin gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bsu yangs su rdzogs par byed do// de'i phyir mthon po gnas
208b3(mdo sde): mchog ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so// dma' ba'i gnas ni ni 'dod chen pa rnams so// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu de ltar ngo mtshar rnam pa gnyis te/ log
208b4(mdo sde): par nges pa'i gang zag ni 'dod chen po yin par soms shig/ yang dag par nges pa'i gang zag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos yin par sems
208b5(mdo sde): shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i 'phreng ba la bka' stsal pa sor mo'i 'phreng ba tshur shog/ myur dra rab tu byung la skyabs gsum du 'gro ba zung shig/ de nas
208b6(mdo sde): sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas slar gsol ba theg pa 'di ni theg chen te/ chags med ye shes kyang bgyi// theg pa gcig po snrubs
208b7(mdo sde): gcig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa don dam skyabs// chos dang sangs rgyas don gcig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku// dge 'dun de bzhin gshegs kyi ming // dge 'dun
209a1(mdo sde): gnyis ni de bzhin gshegs// chos dang dge 'dun gnyis ni thabs kyi skyabapa lags te// de bzhin gshegs ni thabs med skyabs dang don dam skyabs// de bzhin
209a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs lags te// de yi slad du de bzhin gshegs la skyabs su 'chi// ji ltar shing kun za 'dod pas ni shing kun bza' bya zhes// shing kun yang dag bor nas
209a3(mdo sde): shing kun bcos ma za ba ni// 'jig rten dag na bdag la mi phan nad kyang sos mi 'gyur// 'jig rten de 'dra'i phyugs med sman pa stong gis gso mi nus// de bzhin du ni skyabs gcig yongs
209a4(mdo sde): btang ste// zhabs kyi skyabasu gang dag 'jug pa yang // de lta bu yi sbrang bu gzhan med de// de ni sangs rgyas stong gis gso mi nus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na
209a5(mdo sde): sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod gzhon nu'i tshul khrims srungs shig/ de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la slar 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten na gzhon nu gang lags bsnyen pa
209a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa gang lags// 'jig rten na dge sbyong gsal ba gang lags// 'jig rten na sbyin gnas gang lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng
209a7(mdo sde): bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'jig rten skyabs gcig pu/ don dam pa'i skyabs su ma 'tshal ba de dag thabs gnyis po la bkod do// de gnyis 'jig
209b1(mdo sde): rten na skabs lags te/ gzhon nur gyur nas bsnyen par rdzogs pa mi gsal ba de dag dge sbyong lags sam/ gang skyabs gcig po ma 'tshal ba de dag skabs sbyor bar lug la 'gyur/ kang
209b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la don dam pa'i skyabs su ma 'tshal ba de dag thog ma nas skyab su 'gro ba yang ma sbyangs na dge sbyong du lta ga la 'gyur// de ltar skyabs su mchi ba'ang gsal bar ma 'tshal na
209b3(mdo sde): sbyin gnas su lta ga la 'gyur/ gang skya bsdu dang thabs kyi skyabs kyi bye brag ma 'tshal ba de dag ni 'jig rten na gzhon nur mi mkhas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'o na sor mor/
209b4(mdo sde): 'phreng ba khyod srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims srungs shig/ de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims
209b5(mdo sde): mi 'dzin gyi nya ba ltar srog gcod pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin to// srog ces bgyi ba ni nyon mong pa bye ba ste/ de dag bzung nas gang gsod pa de ni 'jig rten na srog gcod pa spangs pa 'dzin pa'o//
209b6(mdo sde): de yang bsad pa'am yang na rgyags pa bcom ste/ bdag gi slob mar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod brdzun smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims
209b7(mdo sde): zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i 'phreng bas mar 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni brdzun smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dzin to// chos thams cad ni mi bden pa rtseg/ bdag ni mi bden
210a1(mdo sde): par smras pa'i chos ston to// de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid mi bden pa zhes bgyi'o// chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos thams cad kyang brdzun
210a2(mdo sde): zhes bgyi'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten dang 'thun pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rnams kyang mi bden pa'i chos zhes bgyi'o// bdag 'jig rten du skye ste rab tu byung zhing
210a3(mdo sde): bsnyen par rdzogs nas/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa thob bo// gzhan gyi sbyin pa'i dngos po la spyod do// bdag 'jig rten na 'chag go// bdag gi ni rma dgu nas de'i bgyi ba bgyi'o// bdag ldum 'tshal/
210a4(mdo sde): lo/ bdag gis so shing blang ngo // bdag gis mig che byug go// bdag sgom mo// bdag gnyid mchog go// bdag gi mgo bregs so// bdag mal du zhugs te nyal lo// rked pa na ba zhig byung ngo //
210a5(mdo sde): bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / rlung dang / 'dus pa zhig byung ste/ bdag gis sman btung ngo // bdag ni shing zad pa'i me bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i chos
210a6(mdo sde): khams par ni mi bden pa ste/ ngatsam du thabs kyis bya ba dang 'jig rtenan thabs kyis bya ba la bdag yongs su spyod pa'i bar du brdzun smra ba'i tshul khrims mi myong ngo // de lan chom pa pa' tshum
210a7(mdo sde): ra tub gang kyis nga las tshan cig/ ba tsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bden pa yang dag pa nyid de na dam pa'i bra drug pa'i sra / de bzhin rnams pa'i bas
210b1(mdo sde): bsgyab pa du/ don ma pa'i bu/ ga gzu dag pa'i buste/ darnadam pa'i sra/ aT+Tam+ba/ pa'i/ don ngas pa'as kyi khan las byas pa'i du
210b2(mdo sde): lhar ston/ de bas na mi bden pa'i chos kyis 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa thams cad ni mi bden pa dang bral ba ste/ de bas na sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// dper na ba glang rdzi dag
210b3(mdo sde): be'u shi ba'i lpags pas be'u ltar byas te brid nas be'u gzhan len tu 'jug pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang zhing spyod pa na/ sangs rgyas ni 'on pa lta bur gyur nas chos ston te/
210b4(mdo sde): ba glang rdzi dang / bltar 'on pa rnams kyang bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'on pa yang 'jig rten du byung ste/ bdag cag kyang 'on pa'o snyam
210b5(mdo sde): ste shin tu dga'o// bcom ldan 'das kyang 'on pa snyam du sems shing bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur ro// snyam du sems so// chos de kho na'i gnas la des bdag nyid skul te/ de bzhin /
210b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad chos la 'god pa de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes so// gal te be'u dngos por slar bstan na/ bzhor yang mi rung / len tu yang mi rung ste/ baglang rdzas be'u gso
210b7(mdo sde): bstan te/ rba sngar gang sbyin nas mi bden pa'i chos la dul bar byed do// de bzhin du gal te sangs rgyas kyis ngo bo nyid don dam pa'i sku 'jig rten du bstan tu zin na/ sku de sus mthong bar nus te/ ji
211a1(mdo sde): ltar bal rba'i chang ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i byed pas chos rnams bden pa ma yin no// de bas na sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du yang lag gang
211a2(mdo sde): dang gang gis sems can rnams chos la rtsom par sems can mang po yongs su smin par mdzad de/ de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid do// de'i phyir bdag kyang mi bden pa'i chos la spyod de/ ji
211a3(mdo sde): tsam du sems can thams cad mi bden pa yin pa de tsam du bdag kyang brdzun smra ba'i chos mi 'dzin te/ de'i tshe bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
211a4(mdo sde): stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod chang 'thung ba spang ba'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la slar tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ chang spongs pa yi
211a5(mdo sde): tshul khrims bdag mi 'dzin// chang las myos pa skyes pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin// chang 'thung ba ni nga rgyal skye bar brjod// 'gro 'chag rtag tu rab bde chang zhes bgyi// bde gshegs snying po theg pa
211a6(mdo sde): tshechelas skyes// khu ba 'thungs nas skyes bu ngoms par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag brtan ther zug ces// rab tu dga' ngom sa ha ha legs brjod pa// phun sum tshogs pa de ni bdag thob shos/
211a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'o na sor mo'i 'greng ba khyod 'khrig pa'i chos spang ba'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i'i meng bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas slar 'di
211b1(mdo sde): skad pas gsol s+ho// bangag ni 'jig pa srung ba'i khrims mi 'dzin/ Na gnyugazhan gyi bud med g.yem chags 'dzin// ba dan sa bur yang 'jo khyim na stong // bud med kun gyi drung du'ang rab tu/
211b2(mdo sde): chags// ting 'dzin ron bdag gi chung ma ste/ chos gzhan dga' ba gzhan gyi bung med chags// dpa' zhing bden la dga' ba bdag gi bu// snying rje byams pa bu mo mang po ste// stong ba 'di na
211b3(mdo sde): bdag gi khyims lags so// mtha' yas pha rol phyin pa bdag gi mal/ nyon mongs rnams ni bdag gi g.yog lags te/ zas ni lde ma dag gsang ba bstan pa lags// bdag gis
211b4(mdo sde): bskyed mos tshal ni gzungs rnams te/ byang chub yan lag me tog dag gis brgyan// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes 'bras bu rtse bdag gi chos kyi tshig ni sdong po lags// de la sogs pa
211b5(mdo sde): khyim gnas rtse dga' mchog byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ma lags// 'di ni mkhas pa rnams kyi rang bzhin chos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis stsal pa / 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod ma
211b6(mdo sde): byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i 'phreng ba sa bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas slar gsol pa/ bdag ni ma byin len spongs khrims mi 'dzin
211b7(mdo sde): gzhan nor rku ba'i tshul ni rtag tu 'dzin// ma byin pa ni byang chub lags shes bgyi// de ni sus kyang su la'ang ma stsal te/ byang chub shing drung bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas kyang // khyod kyis
212a1(mdo sde): rnyed pa med cing bshigs pa'ang med// de ni chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin te// de ni bla na med pa'i chos lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i
212a2(mdo sde): 'phreng ba khyod gar dang / rol mo spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i 'phreng bas tshogs su bcad pas slar 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni gar mkhan bzhin du
212a3(mdo sde): rtag tu gar bgyid de// dri za'i dbyangs snyan klog cing glu blangs bro brdung ste// legs so legs so de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston// legs brjod gar bgyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po
212a4(mdo sde): thos// mi sbyin lta bur sgra snyan theg chen mdo sde klag/ mi 'am ci dang dri za'i rnga dang rdza bran dang // sil snyan dag gis glegs pa ma la'ang mchod par bgyi// sems can gang rnams de ltar rtag tu mchod
212a5(mdo sde): bgyid pa// de dag 'jig rten du ni khor mor mi gcig par// phyi dus sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes de bzhin gshegs pa gsung // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba
212a6(mdo sde): khyod gcigs shes rmobs cig/ sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la slar 'di skad ces gsol to// cig cig zhen/ sems can thams cad ni zas la gnas so zhes/ nyan thos kyi thes
212a7(mdo sde): palas byung ba'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po la de lta bu'i rnam pa ma mchis so// theg pa chen po rnams ni rtag tu mig mi 'dzums shing brtan pa'o// cig cig zhe na/ sems can thams cad ni de
212b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la gnas pa'o// ci gnyis zhe na/ ming dang gzugs kyi tshig nyan thos kyi theg pa las 'byung ba ste/ theg pa chen po la ma lags so// ming dang gzugs ni de lha 'a/
212b2(mdo sde): te ming dang gzugs rnam pa gzhan ma lags so// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thar pa ni ming tsam su/ gzugs dang dbyibs mi rig go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
212b3(mdo sde): kyi thar pa ni lag thil na skyu ru ra'i gzugs bzhin no// ci gsum zhe na/ tsho ba gsum nyan thos kyi theg pa las 'byung ste/ theg pa chen po rnams kyi ma lags so// tshor ba 'di gsum ste/
212b4(mdo sde): gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i mchog la mi rtag par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor ba'o// dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor ba'o// dge 'dun mi snang //
212b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor ba ste/ de gsum theg pa chen po'i tshor ba'o// ci bzhi zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/
212b6(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la de lta bu'i rnam pa ma mchis so// 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin dang byed pa rnams ni bden pa bzhi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag ces bgyi ba de ni theg pa chen po la shin tu bden pa ste/
212b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ni bden pa ma lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug go zhes bgyi ba de ni shin tu bden te/ kun 'byung ba ni ma lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ther zug gi mchog go zhes bgyi
213a1(mdo sde): ba ni shin tu bden gyi 'gog pa ni ma lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'o zhes bya ba de ni shin tu bden gyi lam ma yin ste/ theg pa chen po la 'phags pa'i bden pa de
213a2(mdo sde): bzhi'o// sdug bsngal gyi bya ba bden pa ma lags so// sdug bsngal gyi bya ba bden du lags na/ sdug bsngal rnam bzhi bden par 'gyur te/ dud 'gro dang / g.yi dgas dang lha ma yin dang /
213a3(mdo sde): gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhir 'gyur ro// ci lnga zhe na/ dbang po lnga zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po la ni ma lags
213a4(mdo sde): dbang po lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa gsal bar blta'o zhes ma tshang ba med par bsgom pa de ni mig go// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'o zhes thos nas ma tshang ba med par bsgom pa de ni rna ba'o//
213a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i dri bsdams nas ma tshang ba de ni snga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i ro myang nas ma tshang ba med par bsgom pa de lde'o// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku'o zhes/
213a6(mdo sde): mu de ro'i mchog zos shin reg nas ma tshang ba med par bsgom pa de ni lus so// ci drug ce na/ skye mched drug ces nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po la skye mched drug gi
213a7(mdo sde): rnam pa 'di med do// skye mched drug ces bya ba ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa gsal bar blta ba'o zhes 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs pa bsgom pa de ni mig gi skye mched do// gang de bzhin gshes
213b1(mdo sde): pa rtag go zhes thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par bsgom pa de ni rna ba'i skye mched do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag pa'i dri thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par bsgom pa de ni sna'i skye mched do//
213b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par sgom pa de ni lce'i skyed mched do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o zhes sku de'i bro dam pa nyan pa dang / reg pa
213b3(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par sgom pa de ni lus kyi skyed mched do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba gsal bar ston pa la 'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis rdzogs par dad pa 'ong ba'i sgo'i skye mched de ni
213b4(mdo sde): yid kyi skye mched do// ci bdun zhe na/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po la yang bdun po de dag u dum wa ra'i me tog rgyas pa bzhin
213b5(mdo sde): du rnyed par dka' ba'i tshig byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po de dag rtse/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas shin tu me tog rgyas pa bdun no// ci brgyad ce na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
213b6(mdo sde): ces nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste theg pa chen po 'di las kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po yang dag par lta ba la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa
213b7(mdo sde): rtag pa'i mchog go zhes rab tu ston pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba thos shing rna bar reg pa tsam gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam
214a1(mdo sde): yang dag par thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug g.yung drung gi mchog bsil bar 'gyur ba shis pa ni sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku
214a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rga ba med pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin par rig par bya'o// ci dgu zhe na/ mdo sde yan lag dgu pa zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags
214a3(mdo sde): pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po 'di la ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes theg pa gcig ces bya'o// ci bcu zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/
214a4(mdo sde): theg pa chen po 'di la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin gyi/ mtha' yas pa'i stobs zhes bya'o// de bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab cing bsam du med pa ste/ stobs
214a5(mdo sde): mtha' yas par mnga' ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mdo sde mtha' yas pa ldem po ngag tu ston pa'o// 'di ni lam gcig po ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni theg pa gcig/ skyabs
214a6(mdo sde): gcig/ bden pa gcig gi phyir 'brang ba/ khams cig pa 'gro ba gcig pa kha dog gcig pa ste/ de bas na theg pa gcig ces bya'o// gzhan ni thabs kyi bya ba'o// de nas bcom ldan
214a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis sor mo'i 'breng ba la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so// sor mo'i 'greng ba legs so// sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong sor mo'i 'phreng ba
214b1(mdo sde): khyod tshur shog/ dge slong sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod tshurab shog ces bka' stsal pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng ba dge slong lo mang du lon pa bzhin du thams cad dge slong dang 'thun par spyod lam mdzes par
214b2(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mchi'o zhes kha'i sgo nas tshig byung ma thag tu der 'bras bu'i mchog dgra
214b3(mdo sde): bcom pa thob po// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba tshur shog/ dze ta'i tshal du sems can bye ba mang po sgrol zhing ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du 'dong ngo // de nas de bzhin
214b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa sor mo'i 'phreng ba dang thabs gcig tu shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lags so pas mdun du bdar cing bskor te/ nam mkha' la
214b5(mdo sde): zla ba nya ba gzas bskor ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i shing mya ngan med pa'i drung nas nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sor mo'i//
214b6(mdo sde): 'phreng ba rtsod pa'i sa nas/ dze ta'i tshal gyi bar du gnas pa'i dgongs bzhi bcur 'dom gang med pa'i bar du gshegs so// de nas sor mo'i 'phreng ba'i ma dang lha dang / klu dang /
214b7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pos mchod pa cher byas te/ dze ta'i tshal du 'ongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngang pa'i rgyal
215a1(mdo sde): po bzhin du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas
215a2(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil bzhin du gyu ri cing gos ka tsa lin da ka lha ra reg na bde ba 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can bzhin du 'gyur to// de nas phyogs
215a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' so so'i de bzhin gshegs pas deng de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa seng ge'i stag chen po dang zab mo chen po bkye nas sems can bye ba mang po sgrol
215a4(mdo sde): zhing chos kyi gtam ston te/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba'i bdag nyid chen po mthong bar 'gyur gyis tshe dang ldan pa dag deng shig tshe dang ldan pa dag deng shig ces pa skye ste sor mo'i 'phreng ba bltar
215a5(mdo sde): lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag phyogs cha gang nas 'ong ba'i phyogs ma de dang de nas me tog sil ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam gyi char bab bo// sems can gang dang gang dag gis pad+mo'i
215a6(mdo sde): dril reg par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad nyon mongs pa med par gyur to// de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang nam mkha' lding dang dri za dang mi 'am ci dang /
215a7(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dang / lha'i bu mang pos lha'i mchod pa mang po byas te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi char yang dag par bsgrubs nas mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pas tshigs 'di skad ces
215b1(mdo sde): rgyab so// brta ma ngan ra yon tan tu ma mngal bam rnam rgyam bzhin dus la yang myangs/ nas ma lal ni zlab mangs pa sa sa mdod rdzu cig le ma dzes la phyag 'a
215b2(mdo sde): rngub pa dam pa bdun mtho ga zugs mchog mngag/ byams mchog pan pa'i yon tan mang po'ing // brtum chog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// nam mkha' la ni rmya ba mthog 'jas
215b3(mdo sde): dzod cu thig la mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// tag drug mtshungs med mchog yangs yon tan mngag/ thub pa dam pa wA mi mchog gis mchod// pad+ma mtshas rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zham/
215b4(mdo sde): nam mkha' la ni thub mchog 'dra bar// mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// ba can dge mtshungs med mchogs yangs yon tan mngag/ zab pa dam pa wa mi mchog gis mchod/
215b5(mdo sde): pad+mo mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// zer gzugs dge mchog yon tan rgya chen mnga'/
215b6(mdo sde): thub pa dang tu mi mchog gis mchod// pad+mo mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bzhi dge mtshungs
215b7(mdo sde): med mchog yangs yon tan mnga'// thub pa dam pa lha mi mchog gis mchod// pad+mo rgyas pa bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal/ nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod gru thig le
216a1(mdo sde): mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bzod 'chang tshul khrims yon tan mtha' yas 'chang // sor mo'i 'phreng thogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// theg pa gcig 'dzin theg pa chen
216a2(mdo sde): bo ston// byams 'chang sor 'breng khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas lus 'dzin dag kyang mtha' yas 'dzin// mtha' yas gsung 'dzin mtha' yas blo gros 'chang // sor mo'i
216a3(mdo sde): 'phreng thogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas 'od 'chang mtha' yas ldem ngag ston// sor mo'i 'phreng thogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas sgyu 'chang mtha' yas bdud rnams
216a4(mdo sde): 'dul// nyon mongs bye ba rnam par smin byed 'chang // sor mo'i 'bring thogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas yongs su mya ngan 'da' byed cing // mtha' yas skye ston 'jig
216a5(mdo sde): rten rjes su 'jug/ dpa' bo mchog 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i 'phreng bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nga ni yang dag pa'i
216a6(mdo sde): mtha' la gnas so zhes gsungs na/ de'i don ji lta bu lags bcom ldan 'das khyod yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas te bzhugs pa ji lta bu lags nga ni thar pa'i sa la gnas so//
216a7(mdo sde): zhes bka' stsal pa chog de la dad par bgyir mi rung na 'di la de'i gtan tshigs bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod 'jam dpal
216b1(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa dang ldan gcig tu dang la 'di nas byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bskyed du med pa
216b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros bskyed du med pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
216b3(mdo sde): gzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bzhugs bzhin mi skye ba'i mtha' la gnas so zhes
216b4(mdo sde): gsungs na ji lta bu lags zhes zhus shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng bas legs so legs so zhes gsol nas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
216b5(mdo sde): ba'i stobs kyis ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar dga' ba bskyed du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der dong nas bcom ldan 'das blo gros bskyed du med pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgya la
216b6(mdo sde): po de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste nye bar phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
216b7(mdo sde): cag gnyis 'dir mchis pa de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas bkye lte 'dir mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yongs su
217a1(mdo sde): mya ngan las ma 'das par de nyid na bzhugs bzhin du ma skyes pa'i mtha' thar pa la ji ltar gnas shes gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das des 'jam dpal gzhon nur
217a2(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gang yin pa nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yin te/ de bzhin
217a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa de nyid ston gyis rigs kyi bu khyed deng la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag cag 'di ltar bkye'o zhes smros shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
217a4(mdo sde): nur gyur pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng ba gnyis langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas dge'o zhes smras te/ ngang ba'i rgyal po bzhin du slar 'ongs so//
217a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu ma mchis so// de bzhin/
217a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku ni mtha' yas so// kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid bdag cag gis mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bskyed du med pa'i
217a7(mdo sde): yon tan 'byung gnas sa'i dbang po rgyal po nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid ston to zhes tshig brjod nas bdag cag slar bkye na sangs
217b1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di na bzhugs bzhin du ji ltar ma skyes pa'i mtha' la gnas pa bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa nga ji ltar blo gros bskyed du med pa yon tan
217b2(mdo sde): gyis 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal por gyur cing / dga' ba spyod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ji ltar gnas pa 'di na 'dug bzhin du de na ji ltar gnas 'di na 'dug la ma skyes pa'i
217b3(mdo sde): mtha' la ji ltar gnas shes ma zer cig/ sangs rgyas kyi sku ni mtha' yas so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtha' yas par rgyu ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mtshungs pa med
217b4(mdo sde): pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshungs pa med par rgyu ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dpag tu med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu med par rgyu ba'o// sor mo'i
217b5(mdo sde): 'phreng ba ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ma skyes par gyur pa de'i don de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang sangs rgyas kyis ston par 'gyur ro// de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas
217b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol
217b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bka' stsal pa sor mo'i 'phreng ba ngas bskal pa brgya stong phrag bcu pha rol tu phyin pa spyad pas sems can yang dag par bsdus te/ sems can byang chub kyi sems
218a1(mdo sde): ma skyes pa'i sems can bye ba mang po byang chub la bkod de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga'i lus bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de'i dge ba'i za bas
218a2(mdo sde): ma skyes pa'i skur gyur to// sor mo'i 'phreng bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ba'i skur gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas
218a3(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ma byung ba'i glog gi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba de ni rnam par snang mdzad
218a4(mdo sde): ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so// sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig
218a5(mdo sde): tu ma byung ba'i glog gi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs par deng la
218a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
218a7(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / sor mo'o 'phreng bas legs so zhes gsol nas ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi rkang pas ma byung ba'i glog gi 'phreng ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der dong nas
218b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin du zhus pa dang /
218b2(mdo sde): snga ma bzhin du 'dir lhags nas sor mo'i 'phreng ba dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar na ma byung
218b3(mdo sde): ba'i mtha' la gnas pa bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sor mo'i 'phreng ba ngas bskal pa brgya stong mang por pha rol tu phyin pa bcus sems can yang
218b4(mdo sde): dag par bsdus te/ sngon ma byung ba'i bde ba la rab tu bkod pas nga'i lus bskal pa bye ba mang por tshad med grangs med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ma byung ba'i lus su gyur to// sor mo'i/
218b5(mdo sde): 'phreng bas gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na 'dus ma bgyis kyi mtha' la gnas/ bka' stsal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs log su gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi
218b6(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrog ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros mi zad
218b7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o//
219a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes bya ba na rnam par/
219a2(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da lngar bzhugs te'aro zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das
219a3(mdo sde): thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi kham
219a4(mdo sde): zab mo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de na zab mo'i mchog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da lhar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin
219a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gongs bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye drug
219a6(mdo sde): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rlung zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi 'a
219a7(mdo sde): pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba da lngar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thug pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o//
219b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs sugang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bdun snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje blo gros zhes bya ba de na
219b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan
219b3(mdo sde): 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su gang+ka'i kyang brgyad kyi byed ma snyed kyi 'jig rten
219b4(mdo sde): kyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i
219b5(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin
219b6(mdo sde): du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes
219b7(mdo sde): bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin
220a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs/
220a2(mdo sde): logs su gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma shar ba zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
220a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs bdal ces bya ba da lngar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas kyisade bzhin gshegs pa de bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang
220a4(mdo sde): gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// / bam po lnga pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
220a5(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bro dam pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bro mchog dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs/
220a6(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung
220a7(mdo sde): gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rtsa lag 'tsho zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
220b1(mdo sde): rgyas rtsa lag/ 'tsho ba'i 'od ces bya ba da wAr bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs
220b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su ga ng+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring bas bskos pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin
220b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phreng ba'i dri mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan
220b4(mdo sde): 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
220b5(mdo sde): ta ma la'i 'dab ma zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas twa ma la'i 'dab ma'i dri zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyi
220b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed 'jig rten gyi kham 'das pa na/
220b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/
221a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su g+hang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
221a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams a ka ru deng ldan pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a ka ru'i dri
221a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su
221a4(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phye mas bsgos pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phye ma'i spos
221a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gsheg pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung brgyad/
221a6(mdo sde): kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgar ma zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i 'od ces bya ba lha
221a7(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su ga ng+gA'i klung dgu'i
221b1(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshar bla gros zhes bya ba de na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtshos byin pa
221b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs
221b3(mdo sde): su gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams klu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
221b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas klu'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho
221b5(mdo sde): phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan chen zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
221b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mtshan gyi 'od ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
221b7(mdo sde): lho phyogs logs su pad+ma'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sprin chen po zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
222a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin chen po'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas
222a2(mdo sde): pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma rnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi 'phreng ba can zhes bya ba de nade
222a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glog sbyin zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji
222a4(mdo sde): ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje blo gros zhes bye ba de na/
222a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba da lur bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji lta/
222a6(mdo sde): gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'gro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin/
222a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis ka de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das sha kya thub pa/
222b1(mdo sde): ba na pa rnam zhig sangs rgyas kyang 'di ya phyags lags ng+gA'i nga drug kyis myed kyi 'ag rten rgya khams 'das du ga sa kyims pa gas bya
222b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa gru bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyam non bu 'dzin cheng gis bye bdaka' bzhugs te ma slong gzhes kyis// de bzhi gshegs pa de la bsam ldan 'das grub pa
222b3(mdo sde): sngar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi shing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gad+ha'i klung bdun gyi byem snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nas mkha' ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/
222b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan
222b5(mdo sde): 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs sug d+hA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dul ba zhes
222b6(mdo sde): bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan
222b7(mdo sde): 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi
223a1(mdo sde): 'phreng ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis
223a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/
223a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams seng ge'i blo gros zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i snying po zhes bya ba du ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis
223a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das
223a5(mdo sde): pa na rta 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snyan pa zhes bya ba de ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin
223a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su gad+ha'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na
223a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i byin zhes bya ba da lngar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin
223b1(mdo sde): sa ma ldan sgrub dang sa nyam su gyubs la su gas rgyas da sa
223b2(mdo sde): 'angs rten gyi khams kun tu babang ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu tho gros zhes bya ba nga gar bzhugs te dro zhing gzhes kyis
223b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya grub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs legs su ga ng+gA'i blang bzhi'i bye me snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das
223b4(mdo sde): pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/
223b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
223b6(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te
223b7(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed/
224a1(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang /
224a2(mdo sde): po'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub
224a3(mdo sde): phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mig gi bdag po zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
224a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mig gi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas
224a5(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
224a6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ka'i la sa'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji/
224a7(mdo sde): gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnga sgra zhes bya ba de ni/ de ba
224b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga dbyangs shes bya ba ltar bcugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa/
224b2(mdo sde): dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams blta na thug pa zhes bya ba de na
224b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sdug pa'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das
224b4(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
224b5(mdo sde): dga' ba 'phel ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba 'phel ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas kyis/ de bzhin
224b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su ga d+hA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
224b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'das pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes sdug ces pa bden/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mdzes pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te
225a1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byung gi
225a2(mdo sde): phyogs mtshams logs su ga ng+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
225a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyu'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas
225a4(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spyod pa yid 'phrog ces bya ba de na
225a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod pa'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das
225a6(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi/
225a7(mdo sde): khams sems can dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems can gyi mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis
225b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi
225b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams glog ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glog gi bla me zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs
225b3(mdo sde): tre tshe zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs
225b4(mdo sde): mug ng+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba den/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
225b5(mdo sde): rgyas yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi
225b6(mdo sde): zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin
225b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji
226a1(mdo sde): ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/
226a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtan pa'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes kyis
226a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gad+hA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed
226a4(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chu'i ro zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chu'i chog ces bya ba da ltar bzhunas
226a5(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su
226a6(mdo sde): pad+ma'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog can ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o//
226a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ bya shar gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba di nam
226b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bsil ba zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang sha phyogs mtshams logs sug ng+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
226b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mchog ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi
226b3(mdo sde): ning 'di nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser 'od ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gse
226b4(mdo sde): mchog dpal zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na//
226b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gser mdog ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gsal zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang rdza ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar gyi
226b6(mdo sde): phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser
226b7(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/
227a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams dra ba can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can gyis 'od ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/
227a2(mdo sde): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i chu zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chu'i rgyal po zhes
227a3(mdo sde): bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na
227a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims kyi snying po zhes bya ba la dris shog pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dinas
227a5(mdo sde): bya shar gyi phyogs mtshams su gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gling zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung zhes bya/
227a6(mdo sde): ba la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lho phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
227a7(mdo sde): chen gyi rnams 'das pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje 'byung gnas shes bya ba den/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gro gros shes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gangam bzhin du badru'o// sangs
227b1(mdo sde): zhing 'di nas shar lho phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba de na
227b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blo gros tog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs
227b3(mdo sde): mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams blo gros grub pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa don grub dpal
227b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ing gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das
227b5(mdo sde): pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i chu zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i bai DUR+Ya zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di//
227b6(mdo sde): nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dus pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams skyed bu krung la dga' ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin
227b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa skyes bu klu'i snying po la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
228a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi'o zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa spros brtsegs zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma
228a2(mdo sde): bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten
228a3(mdo sde): gyi khams spros ldan zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi snying po zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lnga'i sa
228a4(mdo sde): marnams logs su gang+gA'i glang brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams drang ba'i 'di ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa drang po'i dpal
228a5(mdo sde): b+ha ba la rjes shig pa'ang gang ma bzhin du bcu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sa rakhri'i phyogs mtshams logs mug ng+gA'i brang dgu'i byem skad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa
228a6(mdo sde): kyi rnam pa na mthang med pa kyim gyi ba den/ zhin ga shegs pa rin mgang mang pa kros pabral dris shig pa'adi ga ma bzhin du bskur// sangs rgyam gyi du zhim
228a7(mdo sde): tha ma mnam dran na yul chu'i kyi gyi dzi rten gyi kham 'jas pan/ 'dzi na gyi khams mtha' mas gtsug grang ngan gis kyi bad/ debazhin gshegs pa
228b1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du brdzu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su
228b2(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
228b3(mdo sde): 'od de pag tu med pa zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du brdzu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten
228b4(mdo sde): gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i mig ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba la
228b5(mdo sde): dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig
228b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams me'i gzi brjid ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me'i 'od ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs
228b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa sel ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
229a1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mun pa sel ldan zhes bya ba la dris shig par dgong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs
229a2(mdo sde): mtshams logs su gang+gA'i chung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams byin pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
229a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi
229a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi skye ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi skye ba'i dbang phyug la dris shig pa'ang
229a5(mdo sde): gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi glang
229a6(mdo sde): bo che zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi glang po che'i rnam par gnon pa la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/
229a7(mdo sde): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gad+ha'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi snod ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
229b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi snod rgyal po la dris shig pa'ang song ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gad+hA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten/
229b2(mdo sde): gyi kham pa 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba la dris shig nga'ang gong ma bzhin du
229b3(mdo sde): bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi 'phreng ba zhes
229b4(mdo sde): pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la/
229b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
229b6(mdo sde): khams 'jig rten mthong ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad mthong na dga' ba cher 'phags pa'i rgyal
229b7(mdo sde): bo 'od 'phro ba rnam par sprul pa'i bkod pa go che chen po bgos pa/ sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po thams cad la 'od byed snang ba'i sgo zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs
230a1(mdo sde): pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ steng gi phyogs logs su gang+gA'i chung gnyis kyi bye ma sbed
230a2(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma dka' bo zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkal
230a3(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lteng gi
230a4(mdo sde): phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nus me tog la 'byed pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
230a5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kha 'bye ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris
230a6(mdo sde): shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs legs su gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba den
230a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan thams cad med pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la
230b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shakya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logs su ga ng+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jog rten/
230b2(mdo sde): gyi khams ut+pal mthong ka zhes bya ba den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i ut+pala'i dpal zhes bya ba da sngar bzhugs te 'chu zhing gzhes
230b3(mdo sde): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logs sug ng+gA'i klung drug gi
230b4(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i snying
230b5(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
230b6(mdo sde): steng gi phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ku mu dA dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
230b7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ku mu tra'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas
231a1(mdo sde): pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
231a2(mdo sde): gyi khams sa ki'i spos zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshes pa ba yoyang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa ki'i spos zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs
231a3(mdo sde): pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das
231a4(mdo sde): pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gau kang si ka zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkra shis thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar
231a5(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs
231a6(mdo sde): logs su gang+gA'i glang bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bsod nams kyi sngags can zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
231a7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsod nams kyi stegs kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
231b1(mdo sde): ba ji la gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nasa'ogag phyogs logs sug d+hAd+ha'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams seng
231b2(mdo sde): ge'i tshul zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og
231b3(mdo sde): gi phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams stag gi phug ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
231b4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stug sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
231b5(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shing sa ha ka ra zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa ka ha ra'i me tog rlung zhes bya ba dang /
231b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ldan zhes bya ba dang
231b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad las rgyal bar 'dul ba zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su
232a1(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes mi chags pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs/
232a2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa chen po rnam par sgrogs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs pa logs su ga
232a3(mdo sde): klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mkha' 'bigs 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
232a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas mkha' 'bigs rtse mo zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig
232a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams ldad mo che ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri mo thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
232a6(mdo sde): nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams blo gros 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
232a7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
232b1(mdo sde): khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i blo gros zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang sangs/
232b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba den
232b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas the tsom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod pa'i 'byung nas rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis
232b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das par bzhugs shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig gi
232b5(mdo sde): dpes brgyan pa'i 'thar pa'i mtha' la ji ltar gnas pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod deng la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de la dris
232b6(mdo sde): shig/ khyed kyi the tsom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod par 'gyur te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan the tsom dang yid gnyis thams cad bcod pa zhes bya'o// de nas 'jam dpa'
232b7(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sor mo'i 'breng bas bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ rdzu 'phrul
233a1(mdo sde): gyi rkang pa'i stobs kyis ngang pa'i rgyal po lhar dong ste/ rtag tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom dang
233a2(mdo sde): yid gnyis thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten
233a3(mdo sde): gyi khams nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas 'dir mchis so// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcu'i zhabs kyi drung du'ang phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa
233a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/ mya ngan las ma 'das bzhin du thar pa'i mtha' la ji ltar gnas pa de dag thams cad la zhus na/ de bzhin gshes
233a5(mdo sde): pa de dag gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa nged dang gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa de la zhus shig ces gsung nas
233a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas kyang rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis deng the tsom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod pa'i rnam pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig ces bdag
233a7(mdo sde): cag 'dir bkye ste mchis so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs shing mya ngan las ma 'das par ji ltar na thar pa'i mtha' la gnas shes zhus pa dang /
233b1(mdo sde): de gnyis kyi tshigs gsan nas de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu myur du slar log shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa des the tsom dang yid gnyis
233b2(mdo sde): thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid dang yin te/ tha dad pa ma yin no// de ltar shAkya thub pa ni tshad med do zhes gsungs nas slar bkye'o// de nas
233b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol te sor ma'i 'phreng ba dang lhan cig te de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag
233b4(mdo sde): 'tshal te dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni tshad med
233b5(mdo sde): grangs med par 'dzin pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid nga yin te/ shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa des khyed kyi the tsom thams cad gcod par 'gyur gyis khyed deng shig ces de dag gis
233b6(mdo sde): kyang bdag cag slar bkye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de gsung ngam/ de dag gis gsol pa
233b7(mdo sde): de gcig gsung ba bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad gsung ste tha mar bdag cag gis zhus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de yin te
234a1(mdo sde): #/ gcig go zhes gsung ngo // bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ci 'dra/ de gnyis kyis/
234a2(mdo sde): gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su bdag cag gis byin pa thams cad ni gram pa dang / gyo mo thams cad ma mchis pa lag ma thil bzhin
234a3(mdo sde): du mnyam pa/ ka tsa lin di ka bzhin du reg na bde ba/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ltar snyigs ma lnga dang bral ba nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / bud med ma
234a4(mdo sde): mchis pa theg pa gcig te/ theg pa gzhan la mi 'jug go// bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi mtshan rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang kha don legs par byed dam
234a5(mdo sde): 'dri 'am/ nyan kyang rung ste/ bsnying ngam/ brjod dam/ gzhan gyi phyir 'phya'am/ bdag gis brjod na/ bdag 'jig pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro// lha thams
234a6(mdo sde): cad kyang de la gnod par mi byed do// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dri za la sogs pas kyang mi
234a7(mdo sde): tshugs so// zos nas la bsrung bar 'gyur/ des 'gro ba bzhi bcad pa yin no// byang chub kyi sems ma skyes pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi rgyu thob par 'gyur ro// zhes gsung ngo // sor
234b1(mdo sde): ma'i 'phreng ba gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid ngo mtshar ba ni gzungs mtshungs pa med pa'i mdo sde chen po las sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cugacig ste/ dacid de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid min /
234b2(mdo sde): nozhes rgya cher bshad do// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsngags pa yang bsam gyi mi khyab bo// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'ang chad med pa'o/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi mu yang /
234b3(mdo sde): mtha' mas grangs med de/ de la bu yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la/ mi thag pa dang nang lag la 'byungade bzhin gshegs pa'i mu rtag pa dang / mtha' yas pacwa ba dang
234b4(mdo sde): rgyu dang rkyen du bcas pa'i gtan tshigs thams cad khyed la rgya cher bsten to// 'jig rten gyi khams na/ skye bo rnams mi dge bas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'din
234b5(mdo sde): rgyal po mo bzhed po mi dge ba dge ba la bkod pa'i phyir lus yang dang yang btang bas na/ nga'i lus ma skyes pa'i sgrar gyur to// nga'i lus bkal pa bye ba grangs med pa mang por dam pa'i
234b6(mdo sde): chos bsrung ba'i phyir nga'i lus gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lus re re yang bcad btubs bcos nas byin pas nga y-i lus ma shigs pa 'dus ma byas kyi lus mtshungs pa med par gyur to//
234b7(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba mang por dpa' bo ltar 'dug ste/ gnas mang por gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lus mang po gtang ste/ lus re re yang bskal pa bye ba mang por dpa' bo ltar 'dug cing dka' ba spyad
