383a3(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'du shes/ nyon mongs par nang du yang mi ston/ phyi rol du yang ma yin/ gnyis ka med par yang ma yin ste/ nyon mongs pa khong du chud pa nyid/ nyon mongs pa
383a4(mdo sde): med par shes shing nyon mongs pa yang mi sel/ nyon mongs pa yang med pa yang mi bsgrub/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang sprir dang / char spyir 'dra bar shes te
383a5(mdo sde): ye shes dang lhag mthong gi rlung gis gtor nas/ phyogs dang yul du 'gro ba yang med granas pa yang med pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni mumra dang 'dra ste/ yongs su rtogs pa'i
383a6(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan gyi/ bi ni mnya par ston pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni mun pa'i spyod yul te/ shes rab kyi sngon mas mi sdang ba sdang bar byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni chom rkun dang
383a7(mdo sde): mkha' 'jom dang / gnod phrin dang / srin po dnga'ang ste/ tshul pa'ir ying la byed pas btag na gnas pa ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni grags tshol pa'i/ rtul bsems
383b1(mdo sde): yin pa yid 'byed pas 'phel ba dang / spyong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i shes pas yid la 'jug par mi byed pas/ sus kyang nyon mongs pa rnams 'di 'dra bar shes/
383b2(mdo sde): te/ sems can nyon mongs pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams la snying rje zhing bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa mngon sum du gyur pa ma 'dul ba 'dzin pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o// de ltar/
383b3(mdo sde): nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyis/ rang rang gi 'dod pa bdud sdig can de la kun dris nas/ bdud sdig can gyis kyang de dag thams cad kyi don gtan la bab pa bstan pas sems rangs par
383b4(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs/ 'khor re nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bdud sdig can de la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ni byang chub
383b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyis bdud kyi las bshad zin gyis/ khyod kyang spobs par gyis shig/ sdig can byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud
383b6(mdo sde): sdig can gyis lha'i bu mtshan bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// nyi shu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag pul yin no// nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
383b7(mdo sde): rnal 'byor spyod pa/ rnam par zol ba 'dod cing 'khor bas skrag pa rnams la snyen pa dang / sten pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa ni bdud kyi las so// stong pa nyid la so sor rtog
384a1(mdo sde): cing sems can yal bar 'dor ba yang bdud kyi las so// 'dus ma byas la so sor rtog cing / 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su skyo ba yang
384a2(mdo sde): bdud kyi las so// bsam gtan skyed cing / bsam gtan las rnam par ldog pa tshul ba yang bdud kyi las so// chos ston kyang chos nyan pa rnams la snying rje chen po mi skyed pa yang
384a3(mdo sde): bdud kyi las so// yon tan dang ldan pa dang / spyir gnas tshol zhing / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khro ba yang bdud kyi las so// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
384a4(mdo sde): gtam ston cing / theg pa chen po'i gtam 'chab pa yang bdud kyi las so// zab mo'i gtam 'chab cing gtam sna tshogs ston pa yang bdud kyi las so// byang chub sems pa'i lam
384a5(mdo sde): shes kyang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi tshol ba yang bdud kyi las so// rab tu rtson pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang / sems can gyi brtson pa rnams mngon par mi sbyor ba yang bdud
384a6(mdo sde): kyi las so// dge ba'i rtsa ba srog kyang byang chub kyi sems mngon du mi byed pa yang bdud kyi las so// lhag mthong gi rnal 'byor dang ldan par gnas kyang / sems can rnams
384a7(mdo sde): lhag mthong yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa yang bdud kyi las so// nyon mongs pa ma lus par zad par tshol zhing / 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis nyon mongs pa rnams la smon pa'ang bdud
384b1(mdo sde): kyi las so// shes rab kyis rnam par dpyod cing / snying rje chen po la dmigs pa 'dzin pa yang bdud kyi las so// thabs dang mi ldan par dge bar spyod pa thams cad kyang bdun
384b2(mdo sde): kyi las so// byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdod mi tshol gyi/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gsung tshig 'dzin pa yang bdud kyi las so// mang du thos kyang gzhan gyis shes kyis rog te/ chos
384b3(mdo sde): la slob dpon dpa' mkhyur byed pa yang bdud kyi las so// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa'i zhal ta byed cing mang du thos pa mi tshol ba yang bdud kyi las so// byang chub sems dpa' chos smra/
384b4(mdo sde): ba theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa bskal pa nyam pa rnams la mi sten/ mi snyen/ bsnyen bkur mi byed kyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par
384b5(mdo sde): zhugs pa/ skal ba mi mnyam pa la dgal ba yang bdud kyi las so// gang gi tshe brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ tshong dpon nam
384b6(mdo sde): khyim bdag gi longs spyod dang / nor dang / rin po che dang / dbang phyug gi che ba nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe/ chos kyi che ba nyid dang ldan pa rnams la mi sten/ mi sten/ bsnyer ba
384b7(mdo sde): mi byed pa 'di dag ni/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag du la nyi shu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la sdig can khyod kyis/ bya
385a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las 'di dag legs par bshad pa ni legs so legs so zhes/ legs so zhes bya ba byin no// byang chub sems
385a2(mdo sde): dpa' gang dag bdud kyi las 'di rnams thos shing / zos nas kyang rnam par spong ba de dag/ byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu thob par 'gyur ro// nyi shu gang zhen
385a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba
385a4(mdo sde): mnyes par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams can pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bskal pa mnyam pa dang / gzungs rab tu thob pa dang / spobs pa phun sum
385a5(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa shes pa dang / chos ma thos pa nyan/ tshe rabs tshe rabs su byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung ba
385a6(mdo sde): brnyed pa dang / dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub pa dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi shes pas sems can bsdus shing / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dam
385a7(mdo sde): ba'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / g.yo med cing sgyu ma med pa dang / bangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa ste/ byang chub
385b1(mdo sde): yongs su smir bar byed pa'i chos nyi shu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs kyi bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod la/ bcom ldan/
385b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba ni/ sdig can khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di la kho bo snad pa snyed ci zhig legs par rnyed do// de
385b3(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi gang 'byung po babs pas bstan pa de ni/ mi de'i 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ de ni 'byung po de'i 'gyur bar blta'o// lha'i bu de bzhin
385b4(mdo sde): du kho bo yang 'jam dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs nas ston gyi/ 'di kho bo'i skyes bu'i stsal du ni mi blta'o// lha'i bus spras pa/ sdig can khyod sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan
385b5(mdo sde): dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan zhing / chos ston pas dga' bar gyur tam/ bdud kyis spras pa/ khyod kyi niri kho bo brgyan
385b6(mdo sde): par mthong ba ltan/ kho bo na cing ba dam pos bdag bcing bar shes so// lha'i bus smras pa sdig can/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bzod pa gsol cig dang /
385b7(mdo sde): nas gtong bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bdud kyi lha'i bu mtshams bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
386a1(mdo sde): chen po// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la bzod par gsol mi dgos so// de ci'i phyir ne na/ de bdag la 'khrug pa med/ khro ba med pa'i/
386a2(mdo sde): phyir ro// gang dag 'khrug cing khro ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol dgos so// lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ci 'dra/ bdud kyi smras pa/
386a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ni/ rnam pa bcu gnyis te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcos ma ma yin pas bsam pa'i bzod pa dang / khong khro ba
386a4(mdo sde): med pa'i sems kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi slu bas/ g.yo med pa'i bzod pa dang / dbul zhing phongs pa yongs su skyob pas snying brtse zhing snying
386a5(mdo sde): rje ba'i bzod pa dang / ldog pa med pas ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'i bzod pa dang / lta bar song ba dang bral bsastong pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang chos nyis la rton pas chos/
386a6(mdo sde): nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang / bdag med pas zab mo'i bzod pa dang / 'phags skye bo'i rjes su 'jug pas 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang
386a7(mdo sde): 'thun pas yang dag pa'i bsod pa dang / sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung bas ngo byed pa yang ming la mi mthun pa'ang med pa'i bzod pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par
386b1(mdo sde): tu thob pa'i phyir/ rtse bamed cing 'byung ba med cing bzod pa ste/ lnga'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis so// wa'i zas snyam pa ldan/
386b2(mdo sde): can khyod gal te bsol na/ dga' bar 'gyur dam/ bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo dka'/ mchog tu dbya'o// de nas kwa'i bu mtshams bdangs kyis/ 'jam dpas
386b3(mdo sde): gnor nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdud sdig can thong shig dang / rang gi gnas su 'gro'o// de nas 'jam dpal gnon dur gyur pas/ bdud sdig can pa
386b4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod su zhig gis bcings/ gang las dkrol/ bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag ni smras bcings mi shes so// 'jam dpal
386b5(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ sdig can khyod ji ltar bcing ba med pa la bcing bar 'du shes pa de bzhin du/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/ sdug bsngal
386b6(mdo sde): ba la bde bar 'du shes/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes/ gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes/ tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa
386b7(mdo sde): dang / 'du byed rnams med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes so// sdig can khyod dgrol ra
387a1(mdo sde): gang nas dgrol/ bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag ni gang las kyang mi dgrol lo// smras pa/ sdig can de bzhin du gang dag rnam par dgrol ba yang / yang
387a2(mdo sde): dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes yongs su shes pa ma gtogs par/ gang las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba med de/ de dag yongs su shes pas rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o// de nas
387a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pas/ byin gyis brlabs de bsdus pa dang / sdig can de'ang rang gi gzugs dang ldan par bdag gi shes so// de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po bdud sdig
387a4(mdo sde): can la 'di skad smras so// sdig car khyod kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas pa leg so legs so// bdud kyi smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po 'di ri kho bo ni yul ma yin gyis 'di
387a5(mdo sde): ri 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yul du blta'o// de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon rur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi
387a6(mdo sde): mdzad pa gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bus sa rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams su btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i byar
387a7(mdo sde): zhen gal te sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzir ba med na/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzangad bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ gal te sems can rnams na/
387b1(mdo sde): bar mthar na/ sman pas kyang bya ba ma 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lnga'i tha sems can rnam ston mongs pas gzir bar ma gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad sa mi 'gyuraro// rtswa'i bu
387b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang byung na sangs rgyas 'byung / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu skye ba dang rga ba dngan pa dang / 'chi babyung na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir
387b3(mdo sde): zhe na chos de dag spang ba'i don du sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas/ chos skyed pa de glang
387b4(mdo sde): chos bkag pa de gang 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas/ chos gang yang bskyed pa yang med/ bkag pa yang med do// de ci'i
387b5(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu chos thams ni skye ba ma yin/ 'gag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba sangs rgyas 'byung po zhes bya ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid
387b6(mdo sde): kyis skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
387b7(mdo sde): gang dmigs pa'i lta bas chos gang la yang kun du mi spyod pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang
388a1(mdo sde): nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa zur sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
388a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ gang nyor mongs pa thams cad kyang 'dor la/ sems can thams cad kyang yongs su mi gtong ba'o// lho'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum
388a3(mdo sde): tshegs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ji ltar ston pas bstan pa bzhin du sgrub cing / sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims la 'gror la lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub kyi sem
388a4(mdo sde): kyang mi 'dor ba'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang chos thams cad shin tu zad pa'i
388a5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid du shes nas/ sems can thams cad kyi gnod sems dang / khro ba dang tha ba spang ba'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi cho ga mi 'dor ba'o// lha'i blos smras pa/ ji ltar
388a6(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' bsngor 'grus phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' chos gang gi phyir// brtson 'grus rlom pa'i chos ngon/ 'di ste ste/ bla na med
388a7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub te/ de nyid shin tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ sems can thams cad kyis le lo spang ba'i phyir/ bcom 'grus gtses pa yang mi 'dor
388b1(mdo sde): ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis soms
388b2(mdo sde): par zhugs par shes kyang / sems can thams cad kyi nyor mongs pa 'dul ba'i phyir yang bsam gtan byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes
388b3(mdo sde): rab pur sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rgyu ba med pa thob par gyur te/ spros pa thams cad dang bral zhing / sems can thams cad kyi lta bu spang ba'i
388b4(mdo sde): phyirashes rab kyis rnam par spyod pa na ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
388b5(mdo sde): byams pa la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/
388b6(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa med par shes pa na'o// lha'i bus
388b7(mdo sde): smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la dpa' ba yang mi skyes la/ mi dga' ba
389a1(mdo sde): yang ma yin pa na'o// lha'i bus spras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams
389a2(mdo sde): cad la gnyis dang bral bar gyur pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
389a3(mdo sde): nam chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur byung ba med par shes pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam
389a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi mchog yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
389a5(mdo sde): nam chos thams cad gzung ba med pa dang / bzhi med par shes par na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go cha chen po dgos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam
389a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par thos nas/ mi dngang / me skrag/ skrag par mi 'gyur zhing / go cha chen po mi 'dor ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang
389a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nges pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ nam snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad ring du sring ba ma yin la/ srid pa'i bag la nyal gyi nye bar bsnyen pa yang ma yin pa
389b1(mdo sde): na'o// lha'i bus spras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs pas/ lus dang ngag dang
389b2(mdo sde): yid kyis gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' blo bde ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam ji ltar thos pa'i
389b3(mdo sde): chos rnams sgrub cing / tshig ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'thun par 'dzin pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis/
389b4(mdo sde): smras pa/ nam rang gi sems dang 'thun pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi bsgo ba las mi 'gyur zhing sems can thams cad dang 'thun par gnas pa na'o// lha'i bus smras/
389b5(mdo sde): pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam sems can thams cad yongs su smin par
389b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ nang du yang nye bar zhi la phyi rol du rgyu ba la yang rkub na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
389b7(mdo sde): smras pa/ ram chags pa thams cad la yang spyod la/ chags pa thams cad la zhen pa yang med pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa bstan pa
390a1(mdo sde): yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo ba yin
390a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam ji ltar byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chung mi gson pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byas pa shes pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
390a3(mdo sde): pa/ nam theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa nyung ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rang gi nyon mongs
390a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang mi 'dod la/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams spang bar yang 'dod pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga shes pa yin
390a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi shes pas/ chos gang yang mi len pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ngoms pa
390a6(mdo sde): yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab la yang gnas la/ 'jig rten pa'i rgyu bas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa
390a7(mdo sde): na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dben pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ namanyen mongs pa thams cad kyis kyang / kun nas nyon mongs par mi
390b1(mdo sde): 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir/ brtson par yang snang ba na'o// lha'i bus sbas pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang dga' rang dbang
390b2(mdo sde): can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam zag pa med pa'i lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du snang ste/ ye shes kyi dbang byed kyi/ nyon mongs pas dbang byed pa ma yin
390b3(mdo sde): pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam bdag nyid kyang mthos pa'i chos nyan cing / ga
390b4(mdo sde): la yang ma thos pa'i chos thos par byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam dmigs
390b5(mdo sde): pa thams cad las 'byung ba rab tu shes kyang / chos thams cad 'phros par yang mi byed/ mi 'phros par yang mi byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
390b6(mdo sde): dpa' sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ nam gzhan dang 'brel ba'i rnam par rig pa mi skyed cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dper
390b7(mdo sde): bar yang rtog la/ rang gi sems kyi spyod pa la yang mi lta zhing / bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pas sgrub pa snying por byed pa ma yid pa na'o// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dri
391a1(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' thos pa thams cad/
391a2(mdo sde): kyang 'dzin la/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnams la yang mtshungs par rab tu 'byed cing / sgra skad brag cha dang / mtshungs par shes nas/ mngon par zhen pa med pa ra ste/ de ltar/
391a3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon rur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal/
391a4(mdo sde): khyod kyi bshad pa'i don 'di sus kun shes par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par gyur pa/ sngon gyi sbyor ba phur sum
391a5(mdo sde): tshogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dmigs pa med par spyod pa de dag gis/ kho bos bshad pa'i don 'di kun shes par 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ de dag ci la mos par
391a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ bsam pa ni gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ de dag ni zab mo la mos par 'gyur te/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa ni bsam pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
391a7(mdo sde): ji ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu nas dge slong 'jig tshogs la lta ba ngo bo nyid kyis/ bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam du sgom ste/ gnyis su/
391b1(mdo sde): med pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid du mnyam par shes shing ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa las 'byung ba yang rol la
391b2(mdo sde): ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa las 'byung ba la so sor rtog pa na/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol bar shes pa na/
391b3(mdo sde): de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang nam dge slong 'dod chags kyi mtha' la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang
391b4(mdo sde): bzhin yang 'dod chags su shes pa dang / zhe sdang gi mtha' la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang zhe sdang du shes pa dang / gti mug gi
391b5(mdo sde): mtha' la gti mug dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / gti mug dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang gti mug tu 'du shes pa na ste/ de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// lnga'i bu
391b6(mdo sde): gzhan yang nam dge slong sdug bsngal yongs su shes par mi byed/ kun 'byung ba spong bar mi byed/ 'gog pa la mngon sum du mi byed/ lam bsgom par yang mi byed la/ sdug bsngal mi skye
391b7(mdo sde): par shes pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rjes su rtogs te/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la kun 'byung ba gang yang med/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la
392a1(mdo sde): 'gog pa gang yang med/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la lam gang yang med pa de ltar dge slong tshul bzhir yid la brtson pa ni chos gang yang skyed par
392a2(mdo sde): mi byed/ 'gag par yang mi byed/ gnas par yang mi byed do// gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa med pa de 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas kyi rang
392a3(mdo sde): bzhin yang 'phags pa rnams kyi bden par bsgom pa ste/ lha'i bu de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ gdod/
392a4(mdo sde): mchi mas gang zhing mchi mas brnangs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras so// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de na/ bdud rnams kyi skabs med do// gang dag chos kyi rnam grang
392a5(mdo sde): 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag gis bdud kyi las thams cad bkag par 'gyur ro zhes de skang smras nas/ bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ yid la btsugs bzhin du de nyid du
392a6(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur to// de ras lnga'i bu 'od mang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa'i don ji ltar bdag gis shes
392a7(mdo sde): pa lta na/ de nas lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul zab mo 'di thos nas spong ba'i dge slong de dag gi rab tu byung ba med do// bsnyen par rdzogs pa med do// lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul
392b1(mdo sde): mchog tu zab pa 'dis skrag par 'gyur ba'i khyim pa de dag gi stong pa de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen pa gang dag
392b2(mdo sde): lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul gachog tu zab pa 'di thos nas/ mi skrag mi dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom
392b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam
392b4(mdo sde): dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di thos na mi sbag mi dngangal dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o//
392b5(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dang / bzod pa 'dis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad nges par
392b6(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lnga'i bu 'od mang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzungs par gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de'i
392b7(mdo sde): phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya bar zung shig/ bdud 'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
393a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu 'ong mang po dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
393a2(mdo sde): rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
393a3(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+he dang / 'dzin mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la bab pa/
393a4(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du Ar+ya many+dzu shrI bi hA ra rA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
393a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi brgod kyi phung po'i ri yadage slong lnga brgya ma
393a6(mdo sde): gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phye 'azer gyi dus kyi che nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/
393a7(mdo sde): 'khor mang pos yongs su bskod cing / mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// deras 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pa chag cing / dge slong lnga brgya po thams cad kyi gnas khang nas gnas khang du byung ste// gnas
393b1(mdo sde): btam para'i bu'i gnas pang gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ 'jam dpas gson nar gyur pas// gnas brtam shA ra'i bu gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ mang yang drug bzhaganas/ pa
393b2(mdo sde): par mthong ngo // mthong nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod bsam gtan byed dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/
393b3(mdo sde): ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod nyon mongs pa spangs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te ma spangs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod 'das pa la gnas te
393b4(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te da ltar byung ba la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan byed
393b5(mdo sde): dam 'on te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod mig la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on
393b6(mdo sde): terna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang
393b7(mdo sde): reg bya dang / chos rnams la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam 'on te gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs mer
394a1(mdo sde): pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod nang la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te phyi rol la gnas te ngasam gtan byed
394a2(mdo sde): 'on te phyi nang la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod lus la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te sems la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ shA ri'i bus
394a3(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ltar tshe 'di la bde bar gnas bya ba dang / brjed pa med par gnas par bya ba'i phyir te/ de lta bu'i phyir bsam gtan byed do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
394a4(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ri'i bu chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa 'am/ tshe 'di ma yin pa la bde bar gnas pa'am/ brjed pa med pa'i chos de dag dmigs sam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
394a5(mdo sde): dpal bdag gis chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa 'am/ tshe 'di ma yin pa la bde bar gnas pa'i chos de dag yang dag par rjes su ma mthong zhing mi dmigs mod kyi/ 'on kyang
394a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang yin pa de la bdag rten cing gnas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang
394a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas/ nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang yin na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang la rten cing gnas/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la dge
394b1(mdo sde): thong ni 'das pa larten cing gnas so// ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas so// bltar byung ba la brten cing gnas so// de bzhin du skur te sems kyi bar la rten cing gnas par khong du chud par bya
394b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben pa gsungs pa yin te/ bdag chos de dag la rten cing gnas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i
394b3(mdo sde): bu gang gi phyir 'di skad ces 'das pa la rten cing gnas/ ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas/ da ltar byung ba la rten cing rab tu dben pa la gnas pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te sems kyi bar la gnas
394b4(mdo sde): shing / rab tu dben pa la gnas zhes smra/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang yod pa ma yin/ gang ma 'ongs pa de bzhin nyid de yang yod pa
394b5(mdo sde): ma yin/ gang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de yang yod pa ma yin te/ de ltar chos de dag ni yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar gnas brtan shA ri'i bu de 'di skad ces 'das pa la rten cing gnas/ ma
394b6(mdo sde): 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas da ltar byung ba la rten cing gnas shes smras/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos la ni gnas pa med do// yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid/
394b7(mdo sde): dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ci yang ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin/ gang gi yang ma yin/ gang la yang mi gnas te/ gang mi gnas
395a1(mdo sde): pa de'i gnas dmigs su med do// yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ces brjod cing kun tu gnas
395a2(mdo sde): nas smra ba de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni g.yo ba med pa/ rlom sems med pa/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni
395a3(mdo sde): nyams pa med pa'o// 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni stong pa'o// mtshan ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa'o// yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang dmigs su med//
395a4(mdo sde): gang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang dmigs su med/ gang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de yang dmigs su med pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid de yang
395a5(mdo sde): dmigs su med do// 'on kyang btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par gang bstan pa'am/ rab tu bshad par rus pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so// shA ri'i bus smras
395a6(mdo sde): pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhir gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs nas chos stor tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin na/ ji lta
395a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu chos kyang yong pa ma yi ra ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston/ de bzhin
395b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa yang yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos stor/ chos thams cad kyang yod pa ma yin to// dmigs su med/ de bzhin gshegs
395b2(mdo sde): ba yang yod pa ma yin te/ dmigs su med do// de'i chos bstan pa ni 'di 'dra ste/ 'di la dmigs pa 'am/ mi dmigs pa gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni brjed pa/
395b3(mdo sde): 'amami brjod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni brjob yang dag par chad pa btags pa med pa/ gdags par bya ba ma yin
395b4(mdo sde): ba'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal su zhig chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'dus byas kyi khams rnam par 'khrugs
395b5(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod par yang mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro// gang 'das pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing / 'das pa'i chos
395b6(mdo sde): rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos
395b7(mdo sde): rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro// gang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mi mthong zhing / de nye bar len par yang mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa
396a1(mdo sde): 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro// gang bdag dang / bdag med par yang spyod par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang len pa dang / 'dor bar yang spyod par mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu/
396a2(mdo sde): 'di'i snod du 'gyur te/ de ni bshad pa 'di'i don kun shes par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bshad pa/
396a3(mdo sde): 'di'i don shes par 'gyur ba ci zhig yod na/ 'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyur zhes de skad 'dri/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos zab mo bstan pa 'di mngon sum du 'gyur ba nyung / 'di ni yongs su
396a4(mdo sde): 'dzin par 'gyur ba nyung ngo // 'jam dpal dgra bcom pa dang / slob pa dang / mi spobs pa rnams kyang sa phyogs 'di la sgyid lug par 'gyur na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
396a5(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ri'i bu dgra bcom pa rnam la ni sa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa yang med na/ sa gang la dgra bcom pa gnas par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa dag ni gnas med pas rab tu phye ba'o//
396a6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa dag ni dmigs su med pas rab tu phye'o// dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod pa dang mi brjod pa shin tu chad pas rab tu phye ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod pa dang / mi brjod pa yang
396a7(mdo sde): dag par chad pa ste/ btags pa med pa'o// dgra bcom pa dag ni sar dbye ba dag dang bral ba/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o// 'jug pa med pa/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba ste/ dgra bcom pa dag
396b1(mdo sde): ni 'dus ma byas pa/ gnas pa med pa yin na/ ci zhig dgra bcom pa dag gisar 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa dag ni ming dang gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no// byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni ming dang gzugs la
396b2(mdo sde): rnam par rtog go// ming dang gzugs de yang rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med par dgra bcom pa rnams kyis shes te/ de'i phyir dgra bcom pa dag ni ming dang / gzugs kyis
396b3(mdo sde): rab tu bye ba ma yin no// byis pa rnams kyang mi dmigs byis pa'i chos dang / dgra bcom pa dang dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigs so// nam mi dmigs
396b4(mdo sde): ba de ni mi rtog go// kun tu mi spyod do// de spyod pa med spros pa med cing nye bar zhi ste yod dro zhes khas mi len med do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ yod kyang yod la med kyang
396b5(mdo sde): med do zhes khas mi len yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin zhes de skad kyang khas mi ler to// nam khas mi len pa de na dmigs pa med do// de dmigs pa thams cad/
396b6(mdo sde): dang bral bas/ sems med cing sems dang bral te/ gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis dge slong gi chos la gnas pa zhes bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa
396b7(mdo sde): 'di bshad pa na 'khor de'i dge slong lnga brgya po stan las langs nas/ 'di skad ces 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi blta'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi mnyan to//
397a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ston pa mngon sum du gyur
397a2(mdo sde): pa bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mtshan nyid gcig tu ston pasachos ma yin pa smra'o zhes brjod nas/ de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
397a3(mdo sde): cag ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par spyod par spyad snyam nas dong ngo // de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/
397a4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod 'di ltar sems can rnams kyi chos kun shes par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos ma ston nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa btsun pa shA ri'i bu
397a5(mdo sde): bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag stan las langs te/ 'phya smod mi snyan pa zer zhing dong ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa btsun pa shA ri'i bu
397a6(mdo sde): gang gi phyir dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag 'di skad ces/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi blta'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi mnyan to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na
397a7(mdo sde): gnas pa'i phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o zhes zer ba de ni/ leg so legs so// shA ri'i bu dge slong de dag gi tshig de ni legs par smras pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal gnon
397b1(mdo sde): nur gyur pa ni yod pa ma yin te/ dmigs su med do// gang yod pa ma yin te/ dmigs su med pa de la blta ba dang mnyan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gang na gnas
397b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yod pa ma yin te/ dmigs su med pas/ gang de'i gnas kyang yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med/
397b3(mdo sde): do// gang yod pa yang ma yin te dmigs su med pa de ri bstan par bya ba ma yin no// de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos pa dang / slar phyogs
397b4(mdo sde): der logs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ba dag cag ni ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar mi shes so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa dge
397b5(mdo sde): slong dag legs so legs so// de lta bu ni ston pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis bya ba ste/ dge slong dag 'di la ni kun shes par bya ba med/ rnam par shes par bya ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
397b6(mdo sde): 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa nyid do// chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de dbyings ma yin no// de ni yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med cing g.yo ba med la 'chi
397b7(mdo sde): 'pho med do// gang g.yo ba med cing 'chi 'pho med pa de kun shes par bya ba ma yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin no// gang kun shes par bya ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba'i rlom sems med
398a1(mdo sde): pa de ni ston pa'i nyan thos zhes bya/ mchog thob pa zhes bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ sbyir gnas zhes bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa ma/ dge slong lnga brgya po
398a2(mdo sde): de dag las/ dge slong bzhi brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong brgya'i sems cher 'khrugs nas lus de nyid dang / sems can dmyal ba
398a3(mdo sde): chen po ngu 'bod du lhung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod sems can rjes su bsrung ba'i chos mi ston
398a4(mdo sde): pas/ dge slong blurgya po de dag chud zos te/ mtshar byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu khyod de skad ma re
398a5(mdo sde): cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu dge slong brgya po de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod der reg pa thang cig reg nas/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye
398a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gal te dge slong de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos su zin na/ de dag gdon mi za bar sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ las de zad nas
398a7(mdo sde): mir skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten pas/ bskal par sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de yang cung zad cig myong bar byas so//
398b1(mdo sde): shAri'i bu de'i phyir/ dge slong brgya po dag de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos thog ma 'dus par dgra bcom pa zag bzung bar 'gyur ro// shA ro'i bur lta bas na/ chos kyi/
398b2(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di som ci dang bcas pas/ thos pa ni dam pa yin gyi/ bsam gtan pa ni la snyoms par zhugs pas ni de lta ma yin/ tshad med pa bzhis ni des mya yin/ gzugs
398b3(mdo sde): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgoms pas ni de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu de ma thos par 'khor ba las yongs su ma grol/ skye ba dang /
398b4(mdo sde): rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams las yongs su ma grol zhes
398b5(mdo sde): bshad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal 'di ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ khyod/
398b6(mdo sde): kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad pa ngo mtshar to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ni bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyang /
398b7(mdo sde): bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// sems can gyi khams kyang bri ba ma yin// 'phel ba ma yin no// kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni
399a1(mdo sde): yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med de/ tha snyad tsam du zad pas ci yang ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin/ gang la yang mi gnas te gnas pa med do// btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang
399a2(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i mi 'gal ba de ni byang chub bo// byang chub gang yin pa de ni thar pa'o// thar pa gang yin pa de rnam par mi rtog go// gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni mi byed cing 'gyur ba med do//
399a3(mdo sde): gang mi byed cing 'gyur ba med pa de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'jam
399a4(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ji skad brtan pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid ni zib ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyang bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// sems
399a5(mdo sde): car gyi khams kyang bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su
399a6(mdo sde): med de/ tha snyad tsam du zad pas ci yang ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin/ gang la yang mi gnas te/ gnas pa meng ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
399a7(mdo sde): ba 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos brjod pas// don gyi ma yin tha snyad tsam// gcig dang sna tshogs mtshan nyid mim@#
399b1(mdo sde): nyid med par gang rtog pa// de dag nyid ni mtshan nyid 'gyur// mtshan nyid med la rtog pa med// rtog pa nyid kyang mtshan nyid mir// 'dus ma byas la gang rtog dang / mya ngan 'das/
399b2(mdo sde): la gang rtog pa// gnyis ka bdud kyi las yin zhes// de ni mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad/ phung po skye mched khams kyi rnams// de dag mong gis brjod pa ste// ming dang skye
399b3(mdo sde): mched gang yin pa// de gnyis mtshan nyid gcig pa yin// tshul bzhin la ni gang rtog pa// de nyid tshul bzhin ma yin no// mkhas pa cung zad mi rtog ste// stong pa ji bzhin
399b4(mdo sde): spyod yul lo// gang dag rtog pa de dag g.yo// rtog pa med pa g.yo ba med// rtog pa rnams kyis g.yo bar 'gyur// rtog pa med par mya ngan 'da'// gang gis rang bzhin 'di shes/
399b5(mdo sde): bo/ de ni ye shes ldan zhes bya// de phyir zad pa rjes su thob// de ni rtog med ye shes so// ye shes kyis ni ye shes brjod// ye shes brjod pa rnams kyang gsog/ ye shes 'di ltar/
399b6(mdo sde): gang bzed pa// de ni ye shes ldan zhes bya// gang gis stong gsum 'di dag rnams// rin chen bkang ste byin pa bas// gang gis dam chos 'di 'dra la// bzod pa de ni bzod pa'i mchog
399b7(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba'i bsam yas su// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan bstan pas ni// mdo sde 'di dang mtshungs ma yin// chos 'di dang ni theg pa 'di// ya
400a1(mdo sde): ngag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs// mdo sde 'di la rten byas na// thams cad de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri ba shang ba na srog chags/
400a2(mdo sde): 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go// dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// gzugs na
400a3(mdo sde): sbyong pa'i lnga'i bu bcud zini bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad bskal pa skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba lnga/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
400a4(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog ces bya bar ming
400a5(mdo sde): 'thun par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang
400a6(mdo sde): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / zi ru bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal
400a7(mdo sde): gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / zhu chen gyilo sna ba ban d+he la shes sdes bskur cing nus te gtan la phab pa/
400b1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ny+tsa shI ni rde sha nA ma ma hA yA ra sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
400b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
400b3(mdo sde): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tham pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe
400b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rin po che'i gdugs dpag tshad bcu 'khor ba tsam thogs
400b5(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das dbu'i gtsug gi steng gi drang thar na 'dzin cing 'dug go// de nas yongs su dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu mtshams bzangs shes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byin/
400b6(mdo sde): mi ldog pa 'khor dang bcas te/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa stan las langs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras
400b7(mdo sde): so// 'jam dpal khyod bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa mdzad pas/ dadung thugs mchims lags sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rgya mtsho chen po chu zed pas chog par 'dzin par
401a1(mdo sde): 'gyur snyam 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal doni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho chen po lta du zab cing
401a2(mdo sde): gting dpag dka' la dpag tu med pa yongs su tshol bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas/ gzhan yang chog par 'dzin par
401a3(mdo sde): minga'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal cil dmig nas/ de bzhin gsheg pa la mchod pa bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bung dmig pa bzhis/ de bzhin gsheg pa la mchod par bya'o// bzhi gang zhen
401a4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems la da mig pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba la dmig pa dang / dkon mcho ba gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par byang la dmig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs
401a5(mdo sde): su dag par bya ba la dmig pa ste/ lha'i bu dmig pa bzhi po dri dag gis/ de bzhin gsheg pa la mchod par bya'o// 'jam dpal gyis de skad ces smras nas/ lha'i bu'i bu mtshams bzas dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub
401a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par bstod do//
401a7(mdo sde): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
